Class RebuildQueryWithNewWhereClause

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.jsqlparser.visitors.EmptyVisitor
      gr.interamerican.bo2.jsqlparser.visitors.RebuildQueryWithNewWhereClause

public class RebuildQueryWithNewWhereClause
extends EmptyVisitor

Rebuilds a query (SELECT SQL statement) given one or more (in case of a UNION) where clauses that are to replace the original where clauses.
